alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:56AM CDT until July 17 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... East central Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 556 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weingarten, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chester, Ste. Genevieve, St. Mary, Rocky Ridge, Weingarten, Rockwood, Kaskaskia, Welge, River Aux Vases, and Minnith. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 141 and 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
